verses.verse: And it came to pass at that time <WH6256>, that Judah <WH3063> went down <WH3381> from his brethren <WH251>, and turned <WH5186> in to a certain <WH376> Adullamite <WH5726>, whose name <WH8034> was Hirah <WH2437>.

And Judah <WH3063> said <WH559> unto Onan <WH209>, Go in <WH935> unto thy brother <WH251>'s wife <WH802>, and perform the duty of a husband <WH251>'s brother unto her <WH6965>, and raise up seed <WH2233> to thy brother <WH251>.

And Onan <WH209> knew <WH3045> that the seed <WH2233> would not be his <WH518>; and it came to pass, when he went in <WH935> unto his brother <WH251>'s wife <WH802>, that he spilled <WH7843> it on the ground <WH776>, lest <WH1115> he should give <WH5414> seed <WH2233> to his brother <WH251>.
And the thing which <WH834> he did <WH6213> was evil <WH3415> in the sight of Jehovah <WH3068>: and he slew him also <WH4191>.

Then said <WH559> Judah <WH3063> to Tamar <WH8559> his daughter-in <WH3618>-law, Remain <WH3427> a widow <WH490> in thy father <WH1>'s house <WH1004>, till Shelah <WH7956> my son <WH1121> be grown <WH1431> up <WH559>; for he said, Lest he also die <WH4191>, like his brethren <WH251>. And Tamar <WH8559> went <WH3212> and dwelt <WH3427> in her father <WH1>'s house <WH1004>.

And in process <WH7235> of time <WH3117> Shua <WH7770>'s daughter <WH1323>, the wife <WH802> of Judah <WH3063>, died <WH4191>; and Judah <WH3063> was comforted <WH5162>, and went up <WH5927> unto his sheep-shearers <WH1494> to Timnah <WH8553>, he and his friend <WH7453> Hirah <WH2437> the Adullamite <WH5726>.
And it was told <WH5046> Tamar <WH8559>, saying <WH559>, Behold <WH2524>, thy father-in-law goeth up <WH5927> to Timnah <WH8553> to shear <WH1494> his sheep <WH6629>.

And she put <WH5493> off <WH5493> from her the garments <WH899> of her widowhood <WH491>, and covered herself <WH3680> with her veil <WH6809>, and wrapped herself <WH5968>, and sat in <WH3427> the gate <WH5869> of Enaim <WH6607>, which is by the way <WH1870> to Timnah <WH8553>; for she saw <WH7200> that Shelah <WH7956> was grown <WH1431> up <WH5414>, and she was not given unto him to wife <WH802>.
When Judah <WH3063> saw her <WH7200>, he thought <WH2803> her to be a harlot <WH2181>; for she had covered <WH3680> her face <WH6440>.

And he turned <WH5186> unto her by the way <WH1870>, and said <WH559>, Come <WH3051>, I pray thee <WH935>, let me come in unto thee <WH3045>: for he knew not that she was his daughter-in <WH3618>-law. And she said <WH559>, What wilt thou give <WH5414> me <WH935>, that thou mayest come in unto me?
And he said <WH559>, I will send <WH7971> thee a kid <WH5795> of the goats from the flock <WH6629>. And she said <WH559>, Wilt thou give <WH5414> me a pledge <WH6162>, till thou send it <WH7971>?

And he said <WH559>, What <WH834> pledge <WH6162> shall I give <WH5414> thee <WH559>? And she said, Thy signet <WH2368> and thy cord <WH6616>, and thy staff <WH4294> that is in thy hand <WH3027>. And he gave <WH5414> them to her <WH935>, and came in unto her <WH2029>, and she conceived by him.
And she arose <WH6965>, and went away <WH3212>, and put off <WH5493> her veil <WH6809> from her <WH3847>, and put on the garments <WH899> of her widowhood <WH491>.

And Judah <WH3063> sent <WH7971> the kid <WH1423> of the goats by the hand <WH3027> of his friend <WH7453> the Adullamite <WH5726>, to receive <WH3947> the pledge <WH6162> from the woman <WH802>'s hand <WH3027>: but he found her not <WH4672>.

Then he asked <WH7592> the men <WH582> of her place <WH4725>, saying <WH559>, Where is the prostitute <WH6948>, that was at <WH5869> Enaim by the wayside <WH1870>? And they said <WH559>, There hath been no prostitute <WH6948> here <WH2088>.

And he returned <WH7725> to Judah <WH3063>, and said <WH559>, I have not <WH3808> found <WH4672> her <WH582>; and also the men of the place <WH4725> said <WH559>, There hath been no prostitute here <WH6948>.
And Judah <WH3063> said <WH559>, Let her take <WH3947> it to her <WH937>, lest we be put to shame: behold <WH7971>, I sent this kid <WH1423>, and thou hast not found her <WH4672>.

And it came to pass about three <WH7969> months <WH2320> after <WH5046>, that it was told Judah <WH3063>, saying <WH559>, Tamar <WH8559> thy daughter-in <WH3618>-law hath played the harlot <WH2181>; and moreover <WH2030>, behold, she is with child by whoredom <WH2183>. And Judah <WH3063> said <WH559>, Bring her forth <WH3318>, and let her be burnt <WH8313>.

When she was brought forth <WH3318>, she sent <WH7971> to her father-in <WH2524>-law, saying <WH559>, By the man <WH376>, whose these are <WH2030>, am I with child: and she said <WH559>, Discern <WH5234>, I pray thee <WH2858>, whose are these, the signet, and the cords <WH6616>, and the staff <WH4294>.

And Judah <WH3063> acknowledged <WH5234> them <WH559>, and said, She is more righteous <WH6663> than I <WH5414>, forasmuch as I gave her not to Shelah <WH7956> my son <WH1121>. And he knew her <WH3045> again no more <WH3254>.
And it came to pass in the time <WH6256> of her travail <WH3205>, that <WH8380>, behold, twins were in her womb <WH990>.

And it came to pass <WH3205>, when she travailed, that one put out <WH5414> a hand <WH3027>: and the midwife <WH3205> took <WH3947> and bound <WH7194> upon his hand <WH3027> a scarlet thread <WH8144>, saying <WH559>, This came out <WH3318> first <WH7223>.

And it came to pass <WH7725>, as he drew back his hand <WH3027>, that <WH251>, behold, his brother came out <WH3318>: and she said <WH559>, Wherefore hast thou made <WH6555> a breach <WH6556> for thyself <WH8034>? therefore his name was called <WH7121> Perez <WH6557>.
And afterward <WH310> came out <WH3318> his brother <WH251>, that had the scarlet thread <WH8144> upon his hand <WH3027>: and his name <WH8034> was called <WH7121> Zerah <WH2226>.
